name: Fox
description: This clever fox loves to explore the forest and make new friends!

name: Alien
description: Meet Zorp! They've traveled from distant galaxies to learn about Earth colors.

name: Cat
description: This curious kitty spends sunny days napping and chasing butterflies.

name: Caticorn
description: Half cat, half unicorn, all magical! Can you help them sparkle and shine?

name: Mushroom
description: This tiny house belongs to the woodland fairies - what colors live inside?

name: Avocado
description: The happiest fruit in the kitchen! Always smiling and ready for toast.

name: Butterfly
description: Dancing through flower gardens, this butterfly spreads joy with every flutter.

name: Cow
description: Moo-nificent! This gentle giant loves rolling in meadows under blue skies.

name: Crab
description: Sideways scuttling champion of the beach! Collector of pretty seashells.

name: Dragon
description: Don't worry - this friendly dragon breathes bubbles instead of fire!

name: Duck
description: Quack! This little swimmer loves splashing in puddles after rainstorms.

name: Owl
description: The wisest bird in the tree! Stays up late reading stories under the stars.

name: Raccoon
description: Nature's little bandit! Always washing food and getting into mischief.

name: Unicorn
description: Prancing through enchanted forests, leaving trails of glitter and dreams!
